snippet: Oil prices rebounded, lifting energy shares. But bond yields remained disconcertingly near record-low levels....
abstract: Dow Jones industrial average achieves new high as markets rise broadly.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices rebounded, lifting energy shares. But bond yields remained disconcertingly near record-low levels.

headline.main: Stock Market Rally Continues, With Records for Dow and S.&P. 500
headline.print_headline: Market Rally Continues With New Highs
